description.fr:
Lorsqu'une {FloorMechanism:1166} est construite\_: {value:x,+}\_{aura:93,value:x}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted}  Si elle a {value:v} {aura:93,value:v}, les consomme et invoque une {Summoning:366!} autour <sprite name="cell_around">.
description.en:
When an {FloorMechanism:1166} is built: {value:x,+}\_{aura:93,value:x}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} If she has {value:v}\_{aura:93,value:v}, consumes them and summons one surrounding <sprite name="cell_around"> {Summoning:366!}.
description.es:
Cuando se construye una {FloorMechanism:1166}: {value:x,+}\_{aura:93,value:x}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Si tiene {value:v} {aura:93,value:v}, las consume e invoca una {Summoning:366!} alrededor <sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de:
Wenn ein\_{FloorMechanism:1166} errichtet wird: {value:x,+}\_{aura:93,value:x}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Wenn es {value:v}\_{aura:93,value:v} besitzt, verbraucht sie und beschwört eine\_{Summoning:366!} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.pt:
Quando uma {FloorMechanism:1166} é posicionada: {value:x,+}\_{aura:93,value:x}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Se ela tiver {value:v} {aura:93,value:v}, as consome e invoca uma {Summoning:366!} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
